SA11sanss06u:8: sati satvârthe yad aṅgam anupayogi tad dṛḍhatarasmṛtyapekṣāniścalamādhyachandaparâpattīkṛtaṃ sarvadhīraceṣṭāsmṛtiḥ /

SA11sanss06u:59: yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti /

SA11sanss06u:123: tathâtrâiva māyādevy-adarśanâkulībhūte āryasudhane ratnanetrāyā nagaradevatāyās taddarśanârtham iyam anuśāsanī /
SA11sanss06u:132: cittanagarapraticchādanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ vipuladharmacchatrasarvâkuśala dharmapratipakṣâbhinirharaṇatayā /
SA11sanss06u:133: cittanagaravivaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ ādhyātmikabāhyavastu sarvajagatsaṃprāpaṇatayā /
SA11sanss06u:135: yāvad evaṃ cittanagaraviśuddhyabhiyuktena kulaputra bodhisatvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalamūla samārjanam anuprāptuṃ /
SA11sanss06u:144: śamāc ca na calec cittaṃ bāhyaceṣṭānivartanāt //
SA11sanss06u:145: asaṃprajanyaparatantrasya muṣitasmṛteś ca cittaṃ calati samīhitād ālambanād anyatra nīyamānatvāt /
SA11sanss06u:148: tā bhavanti tadā tadvaśatvād ekasminn ālambane nibaddhaṃ yāvad iṣyate tāvat tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanss06u:150: adyatve 'pi ca satvârthakṣamo bhavaty eva prasādakaratvāt /
SA11sanss06u:153: āvarjayej janaṃ bhavyam ādeyaś câpi jāyate //
SA11sanss06u:154: etad eva ca bodhisatvasya kṛtyam yad uta satvâvarjanaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:157: tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisatvena pratipattavyaṃ yat sahadarśanenâiva satvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ /
SA11sanss06u:159: na bhagavan bodhisatvasyânyat karaṇīyam asty anyatra satvâvarjanāt /
SA11sanss06u:161: evaṃ punar akriyamāṇe ko doṣêty āha /
SA11sanss06u:162: anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jinâṅkuraṃ /
SA11sanss06u:165: yena câsya paribhavâivam anartho ratnameghe jinenôktas tena saṃkṣepasaṃvaraḥ /
SA11sanss06u:166: yenâprasādaḥ satvānāṃ tad yatnena vivarjayed iti //
SA11sanss06u:169: yāvad iha bodhisatvo nâsthāne viharati nâkāle /
SA11sanss06u:170: nâkālabhāṇī bhavati nâkālajño bhavati nâdeśajño bhavati /
SA11sanss06u:180: yaḥ satvān rakṣati sa śīlaṃ rakṣatîti /
SA11sanss06u:181: anayā kanīyena mātṛgrāmeṇa saha rahoavasthâdiṣu lokarakṣā ca kṛtā syāt /
SA11sanss06u:182: evaṃ bhogyeṣu jalasthaleṣu mūtrapurīṣaśleṣmapūyâdīnāṃ kutsitānāṃ rahasy arahasi côtsargaṃ na kuryād devamanuṣyacittarakṣârthaṃ //
SA11sanss06u:183: saddharmasmṛtyupasthāne ca rahôtsiṣṭaṃ kṛtvânutsiṣṭâhāreṣv adadataḥ pretagatiḥ paṭhyate //
SA11sanss06u:185: na purato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ na purataḥ kheṭe nikṣiptavyêti /
SA11sanss06u:186: eṣa ca gauravalajjāvidhiḥ sarvadraṣṭavyo na brahmacāriṣv eva /
SA11sanss06u:187: atra tu sūtre brahmacāry-adhikāraḥ teṣu gurutarâpattibhayasaṃdarśanârthaṃ //
SA11sanss06u:191: tathā brahmaparipṛcchāyām apy uktaṃ na ca vadhasadṛśena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti /
SA11sanss06u:192: tathā prātimokṣād api lokâprasādakaram anveṣya varjanīyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:195: pralambapādaṃ nâsīta na bāhuṃ mardayet samam //
SA11sanss06u:196: evaṃ svayam apy utprekṣya dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca lokâprasādaṃ rakṣeta /
SA11sanss06u:197: aprasādakaravacanavarjanaṃ tu na sukaram iti smaraṇabodhanârtham upadarśyate /
SA11sanss06u:215: na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā /

SA11sanss06u:224_1: karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇī varṇaviṣpaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyâniśritā bahujanakāntā
SA11sanss06u:225: yāvad itihāsapūrvakam api vacanaṃ parihārya pariharatîti //
SA11sanss06u:232: na bodhisatvenâiṣā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayâparo vyāpadyeta /
SA11sanss06u:233: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayâparaṃ tāpayet /
SA11sanss06u:234: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yat paro jānīyāt /
SA11sanss06u:235: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayârthā nirarthā /

SA11sanss06u:245: asya tu granthavistarasyâyaṃ piṇḍârtho bodhisatvena manasā nityaṃ dhārayitavyaḥ //
SA11sanss06u:249: nirmāṇam iva nirmānaṃ dhārayāmy eṣa mānasam /
SA11sanss06u:257: tasmāt piṇḍapātrād ekaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sthāpayati /
SA11sanss06u:258: dvitīyaṃ duṣkhitānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ vinipatitānāṃ caturtham ātmanā paribhuṅkte /
SA11sanss06u:268: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣâbhimukhena bhavitavyam ity ādi //
SA11sanss06u:270: tena grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caratā dharmasaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:278: dāntâjāneyacittena pūrvadharmamanasikāram anutsṛjatā nâmiṣaprakṣiptayā santatyā piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ sâvadānacāriṇā ca bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:279: yataś ca piṇḍapāto labhyate tatrânunayo na kartavyaḥ yataś ca na labhyate tatra pratighāto*nôtpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:280: daśakulapraveśe na câikādaśāt kulād bhikṣā na labhyate /
SA11sanss06u:281: tathâpi na paritaptavyaṃ evaṃ ca cittam utpādayitavyam /
SA11sanss06u:282: evaṃ bahukṛtyā hy ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayo na tair avaśyaṃ mama dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:283: idaṃ tāvad āścaryaṃ yan mām ete samanvāharanti /
SA11sanss06u:284: kaḥ punar vādo yad bhikṣāṃ dāsyanti /
SA11sanss06u:286: ye câsya satvāś cakṣuṣu ābhāsam āgacchanti strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
SA11sanss06u:288: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā ye me satvāś cakṣuṣâbhāsam āgacchanti piṇḍapātaṃ vā dāsyanti tān sugatigāminaḥ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanss06u:290: tena lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā piṇḍapāta saṃgṛhya samantāc caturdiśaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:295: yadi daridraṃ satvaṃ paśyati tena tatpiṇḍapātāt saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:296: atha na kañcit satvaṃ daridraṃ paśyati /
SA11sanss06u:298: santy anābhāsagatāḥ satvā ye mama cakṣuṣu ābhāsaṃ nâgacchanti /
SA11sanss06u:301: tena tat piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tad araṇyâyatanam abhiruhya dhautapāṇinā śobhanasamācāreṇa śramaṇacāritrakalpa-
SA11sanss06u:308: bodhiprāptaś ca punar dharmeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanss06u:309: yadi punar asya lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhavati tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:310: lūhâhāratayā me laghuḥ kāyo bhaviṣyati prahāṇakṣamôccāraprasrāvaniṣyandanaś ca me parītto bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss06u:314: yadā punar asya prabhūtaḥ piṇḍapāto bhavati tatrâpi mātrâbhojinā bhavitavyaṃ utsarjanadharmiṇā ca /
SA11sanss06u:315: tataḥ piṇḍapātād anyatarāyāṃ śilāyām avatīryâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:316: ye kecin mṛgapakṣisaṃgâmiṣabhojanenârthikās te dattâdānāḥ paribhuñjatām iti //
SA11sanss06u:330: puruṣo me piṇḍapātaṃ dad-ti na strīḥ /
SA11sanss06u:331: strī me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:332: dārako me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārikā /
SA11sanss06u:333: dārikā me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārakaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:336: capalaṃ labhe 'haṃ na kṛcchreṇa praviṣṭamātraṃ ca māṃ samanvāhareyuḥ /
SA11sanss06u:341: na hīnadaridrabhojanaṃ labhe 'haṃ pratyudgaccheyur māṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
SA11sanss06u:344: prāyeṇa hi satvā rasagṛddhā bhojanahetoḥ pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtvā narakeṣûpapadyante /
SA11sanss06u:345: ye ye punaḥ saṃtuṣṭâgṛddhâlulopā rasapratiprasrabdhā jihvêndriyasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kiyallūhenâpi bhojanena jñāpayanti /
SA11sanss06u:349: evaṃ kāśyapa piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā rasatṛṣṇāṃ vinivartayitvā nidhyaptacittena suparipakvān kulmāṣān paribhuñjatā na paritaptavyam /
SA11sanss06u:353: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa piṇḍacāriko bhikṣur meghâkulavṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne na śaknuyāt piṇḍāyâvatartuṃ /
SA11sanss06u:354: tena maitryâhārasaṃnaddhena dharmacintāmanasikārapratiṣṭhitena dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhaktacchadacchinnenâivaṃ saṃjñôtpādayitavyā /
SA11sanss06u:355: santi yāmalaukikāḥ pretā duṣkarakarmakāriṇo ye varṣaśatena kheṭapiṇḍam apy āhāraṃ na pratilabhante /
SA11sanss06u:356: tan mayā dharmayoniśaś cintāpratiṣṭhitena kāyadaurbalyaṃ vā cittadaurbalyaṃ vā nôtpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:362: ciṃ kārayet tatra kule āsane niṣadya dhārmī kathā kartavyā /
SA11sanss06u:363: yāvan na sa piṇḍapātaḥ śucīkrṭo bhavet tena piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā utthāyâsanāt prakramitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:366: nâvabhāsakareṇa bhavitavyaṃ na lapanā na kuhanā kartavyā //
SA11sanss06u:369: lūho me piṇḍapāto rukṣo me piṇḍapātâsīn na ca me yāvadarthaṃ bhuktaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:374: sarvam etat piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā na kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:376: yat pātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā śubhaṃ vâśubhaṃ vā tat paribhoktavyam aparitapyamānenâśayaśuddhena dharmanidhyaptibahulena /
SA11sanss06u:379: yasyāś cântike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śaknoty ātmanaḥ parasya cârthaṃ paripūrayitum anujānāmy ahaṃ tasya piṇḍacārikasya bodhisatvasya nimantraṇam iti //
SA11sanss06u:384: māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpâtmāno bodhisatvasyêti vadāmi //
SA11sanss06u:388: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca /
SA11sanss06u:389: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ câiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet //
SA11sanss06u:390: mrakṣaṇaṃ varjayet tailaṃ śalyaviddheṣu na svapet /
SA11sanss06u:391: chidrâchidreṣu satvānāṃ yac ca sthānaṃ mahābhayam //
SA11sanss06u:393: lābhârthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsârthaṃ dīyate dhanaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:396: yo 'tikramya muner vākyaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣeta durmatiḥ /
SA11sanss06u:398: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpaka-riṇaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:401: acoditaṃ ca nâivâsti tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayet //
SA11sanss06u:402: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayed yogī mayā buddhaiś ca garhitaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:414: buddhaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca vigarhitaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:416: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyante 'tha vā yogināṃ kule /
SA11sanss06u:426: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret //
SA11sanss06u:429: tasmān na bhakṣayen māṃsam udvejajanakaṃ nṛṇāṃ /
SA11sanss06u:431: yat tu jñānavatīparivarte māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ paṭhyate tan mahârthasādhakatvān nirdoṣam //
SA11sanss06u:438: tenâsmin na maitrī śaṅkâpi nâstîty adoṣaḥ //
SA11sanss06u:443: vinaye 'pi yad anujñātaṃ tat tu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na prahāṇântarāyêti /
SA11sanss06u:447: tatra tatra deśanā pāṭhe śikṣāpadānām ānupūrvīṃ bandhan niśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena /
SA11sanss06u:449: tatrôddiṣya krṭāni pratiṣiddhāni tato 'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtāny api pratiṣiddhānîti //
SA11sanss06u:452: śrāvakavinaye 'pi tāvad ātmârthaṃ brahmacaryavāsârthaṃ pātracīvaram api vikrīya /
SA11sanss06u:454: kiṃ punar aparimitajanaparitrāṇahetor bodhisatvaśarīrasya durlabhā cêdṛśī kṣaṇapratilābhôtsavasampad /
SA11sanss06u:455: iti tatpradarśanârthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyôpayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ //
SA11sanss06u:457: tair yadā pracāritaṃ bhavati tadā satyāṃ velāyām asatyāṃ vā teṣām imāny evaṃrūpāṇi kāyôpastambhanāny upakaraṇāni na labhyante 'bhyavahartuṃ /
SA11sanss06u:458: yad uta sarpir vā tailaṃ vā mūlaraso vā gaṇḍaraso vā phalaraso vā /
SA11sanss06u:459: na cânyān abhyavaharato dṛṣṭvā pratighacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanss06u:460: yadi punaḥ khalu paścādbhaktiko bodhisatvo vā
SA11sanss06u:463: yathārūpeṇâsya glānyena jīvitântarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣântarāyo vā tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittam upasthāpya pratinisevyānîti //
SA11sanss06u:466: hrīrapatrāpyakāpair niḥ ... [[DOUBT]] pracchādanârthaṃ tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanârtham imāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣâsurasya lokasya caityam iti /
SA11sanss06u:474: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇy āryamārgasaṃbhārânukūlānîti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā nâikakṣaṇam api sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāmêti //
SA11sanss06u:476: ye punas te kāśyapa vaidaryâsaṃyatêtaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmād uddhurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti /
SA11sanss06u:479: tatra kāśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante ādīptacailā*ādīptaśīrṣâdīptapātrâdīptâsanâdīptaśayanāḥ /
SA11sanss06u:480: yaḥ kaścit tatra teṣām upabhogaparibhogaḥ sa sarvâdīptaḥ saṃprajvalitâikajvālībhūtaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:481: tatra taiḥ śramaṇavarṇarūpeṇa duṣkhāṃ vedanām anubhavantîti //
SA11sanss06u:484: yadi bhaved abhyavakāśiko bodhisatvo glānakāyo 'pratibalakāyas tena vihārakṣitenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:487: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā vihārasyâiva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss06u:488: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhim utpādayāmi nâdhyavasānaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:490: kartavyo dānapatīnām anugraho nâsmābhir ātmambharibhir bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanss06u:492: te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
SA11sanss06u:493: pādasyôpari pādam ādhāya cīvaraiḥ asaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
SA11sanss06u:496: na pārśvasukham anytra yāvad evâiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye jāpanāyai /
SA11sanss06u:497: ity anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ satvârtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ /
SA11sanss06u:506: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogâcārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite /
SA11sanss06u:509: na punar aprāptaphalâikapiṇḍapātam api śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ //
SA11sanss06u:512: sādhu sādhu kulaputrâivaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokâvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate //
SA11sanss06u:517: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogâcāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī /
SA11sanss06u:518: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anātmâdhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇâbhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta /
SA11sanss06u:520: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ
SA11sanss06u:525: agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yêyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ /
SA11sanss06u:526_0: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyâpramāṇaṃ
SA11sanss06u:526_1: cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas tasya dāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyakriyāvipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:527: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣayêti //
SA11sanss06u:528: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanârambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakânugrahe /
SA11sanss06u:533: tatrâpi tāvad imāṃ trisamayarājôktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayârtham uccārayet /
SA11sanss06u:543: athavā tathāgatahṛdayam aṣṭasahastraṃ japet salaukikalokôttaramaṇḍalapraviṣṭo bhavati /
SA11sanss06u:557: ayam eva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ*mārâdibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭebhyaḥ karoti /
SA11sanss06u:558: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapair udakena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā sīmābandhaṃ karoti //
SA11sanss06u:562: vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharmapustake vā samāhito nivedayet //
SA11sanss06u:564: buddhabodhisatvâlambanena sarvasatvârthâbhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:571: adhimukticaryā śikṣāpadeṣv acalasya nirvicikitsasya duḥśīlapūrvasyâpi sidhyati /
SA11sanss06u:575: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet /
SA11sanss06u:576: vicikitsā nâiva kartavyā tasyêdaṃ sidhyati dhruvam /
SA11sanss06u:578: bodhicittadṛḍhatā câtra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamârtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya //
SA11sanss06u:583: tathā kuto mamâlpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:584: na câtikrāntadurgater utsāhôrmibahulasyôpacitâprameyapuṇyaskandhasya bhūmipraviṣṭasyâyaṃ pūrvôkto doṣaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11sanss06u:585: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nâdhikâkṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti /
SA11sanss06u:588: kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvôtsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyâvicārataḥ pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihâiva yathêṣṭasiddhiś ca bhavati //
SA11sanss06u:600: namo 'stu te 'grôgraśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrôttame svāhā //
SA11sanss06u:615: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭâbhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya //
SA11sanss06u:638: yêmāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate /
SA11sanss06u:640: yaś câinaṃ ahir daśati saptadhâsya sphuṭen mūrddhârjakasyêva mañjarī //
SA11sanss06u:641: yêmāṃ vidyāṃ dhārayati sa yāvajjīvam ahinā na daśyate /
SA11sanss06u:643: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni yatkāraṇaṃ sarpo mriyate //
SA11sanss06u:674: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathâvitathânanyathābhūtaṃ satyam aviparītam aviparyastaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:705: rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvôpāye sôpasargebhyaḥ svāhā //
SA11sanss06u:718: imām api vidyām anantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ vidyādharapiṭakôpanibaddhāṃ sarvabhayarakṣârthaṃ prayuñjīta //
SA11sanss06u:732: namo sabbasammasaṃbuddhāṇaṃ sijjhantu me mantapadāḥ svāhā //
SA11sanss06u:738: tatra yadi vismṛtya paradravyam ātmabharaṇatṛṣṇayā paribhuṅkte kliṣṭâpattim āpadyate /
SA11sanss06u:739: atha vitṛṣṇo anyāsakto vā satvakāryam anusmṛtya bhuṅkte na kliṣṭām āpattim āpadyate /
SA11sanss06u:742: satvasvāmikais tu bhogaiḥ satvasvāmikâivâtmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣatêty adoṣaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:743: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyam asti yena varteta //
SA11sanss06u:746: na câikântasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam ananujñāpyâpi bhuñjānasya kaści-
SA11sanss06u:749: nâpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyântike kasyacid viditavṛttântasyâpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittâparijñānāt //
SA11sanss06u:750: na câtra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:751: sarvôtsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhôktyā pratipāditaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:753: tasya spaṣṭâvabodhârtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svârthâpekṣayêti //
